name: Lightning War
description: With hard work of two member team, the first series of the Lighting war finally go online. Hoping everyone enjoy this battle game. Always wondering who's driving the jets, will be a beauty?
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i3 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GTX950 DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: Realtek High Definition Audio
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-7700K Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GTX1060 DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: Realtek High Definition Audio
